actions.text: Committee on Appropriations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Appropriations. Reported to Senate by Senator Byrd with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 102-276.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 454.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority proposed to be rescinded in special messages transmitted to the Congress by the President on April 9, 1992, in accordance with title X of the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974, as amended.

summary.text: Rescinds funds provided to the Department of Defense for: (1) classified programs; (2) procurement of weapons and tracked combat vehicles and other procurement including (R92-105, R92-107, R92-111, R92-120); and (3) specified research development, test, and evaluation programs (R92-127). Declares that funds available to DOD which were proposed for rescission by the President in a rescission messsage of April 9, 1992, and which are not specifically rescinded by this Act, shall be made available for obligation for the same programs, projects and activities as listed in such message. Incorporates into this Act an accompanying Classified Annex. Provides that amounts specified in the Annex are not in addition to amounts rescinded by this Act. Requires the President to provide for the appropriate distribution of such Annex within the executive branch.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority proposed to be rescinded in special messages transmitted to the Congress by the President on April 9, 1992, in accordance with title X of the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974, as amended.
